features: America's #1 Sound Bar* - VIZIO has been filling homes with truly immersive audio for over 10 years, and our sound bars just keep getting better. We are proud to provide our customers with top-tier audio products that bring movies, shows, podcasts, music, and more to life like never before. (*#1 Sound Bar Brand in 1H 2022 Source: The NPD Group/Retail Tracking Service, U.S., based on units, Jan. - June 2022 combined.).Waterproof : No
Compact, versatile design – Sleek, rounded all-black finish with easy-to-clean textured surface, optimized for small-med rooms.
DTS Virtual:X – Sound Enhancement for room-filling, floor-to-ceiling virtualized sound
Full-Range Speakers – 2 full-range speakers in the sound bar provide coherent sound and brilliant clarity.
70Hz – 20kHz Frequency Response – Wide, natural frequency response means you can hear what the artist intended.
95dB Loudness – Experience startling dynamics with minimal distortion or compression for remarkable room-shaking sound.
body.description: Transform your TV sound with the incredible V-Series 2.0 Compact Sound Bar, from VIZIO, America’s #1 Sound Bar Brand. Compact in size, yet powerful in performance, delivering the audio experience that your favorite content deserves. The clean, low profile design fits neatly under smaller TVs. Enjoy outstanding clarity and room-filling sound with Dolby Audio and DTS Digital Surround that combine to create a realistic audio experience. With 2 power-packed full-range speakers, the V-Series delivers striking performance beyond its minimalist size. Get setup and listening in minutes with the included HDMI ARC cable that provides the highest-quality audio in a simple, single-cable setup. This also allows you to control your sound bar with your TV remote. Wirelessly stream your favorite music and podcasts with Bluetooth using your phone or compatible device, and conveniently amplify the voice of your favorite assistant by easily connecting it to the Voice Assistant input, for an upgraded, smart audio experience.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Experience room transforming sound. Enjoy outstanding clarity and room-filling sound with Dolby Audio and DTS Digital Surround that combine to create a realistic audio experience.
2 FULL-RANGE SPEAKERS Hear it loud. And clear. With 2 power-packed full-range speakers, the V‑Series delivers striking performance beyond its minimalist size.

Compact and versatile. The sleek, low-profile design fits neatly underneath smaller TVs and is optimized for small to medium sized rooms. Set the mode to fit your mood. A fully-featured remote with comfort grip makes it easy to customize your audio for the perfect sound experience. Amplify your assistant. Dedicated 3.5 Aux or Bluetooth connection allows you to use your voice to control your Alexa, Siri, or Google Assistant devices through the sound bar. Easy set up. HDMI and ARC inputs send the highest-quality audio from your TV and allow you to conveniently control the sound bar with your TV remote.
Bluetooth Streaming Stream music wirelessly from your phone or any compatible Bluetooth device.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this soundbar for my 40 something inch Vizio TV that I use in my living room. This TV in particular seems to have speakers only on the back of the TV which means even with the TV sound turned all the way up the sound quality was terrible and I could barely hear a thing! It sounded like my TV was in a box! It was absolutely neccessary for me to purchase a soundbar.I wanted a nice middle of the road soundbar that would give me a good listening experience but that wasn't some big investment and I did a bit of research on them before ultimately deciding just to give this one a try. It came quickly and was packed very well. It was actually quite a bit of work to get it out of its manufacturing package.I was able to mount it below my TV that is on a rolling TV stand and place the subwoofer in the back of the room on the floor in a stationary place. The soundbar is the perfect size for my 40 something inch tv and has a great sleek look. It seems to be made very well and is comparable to any other soundbar I've ever seen in person.The subwoofer is also not too big or too small and it's not very noticeable at all sitting on the floor in the back of my room. It's very reasonably sized and blends in well. The only thing I don't like about the subwoofer is that the power cord plugs into the front of the subwoofer which looks pretty dumb.The remote it comes with works well. The soundbar is easy to figure out and use and the sound quality so far has been great. It really changes my whole experience when watching my TV. It makes me feel like I'm in a movie theatre.Being that this soundbar was very reasonably priced, is of great quality and has great sound I am 100% happy with my choice to purchase this specific soundbar and I think anyone else would be as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent for the price
reviews.reviewText: This an excellent system for most people's dens, especially if you're at the "advanced" age where/when you've downsized. It works great with my 56" flat screen TV, small by today's standards. Before this I had a system with a front speaker, 4 surrounds, and a big woofer. That was in a much bigger room. For 95% of people this system will be all you need or want. It sounds great with Fast and Furious and other action type movies.Very easy to set up, even for a guy who's well over 70 years old; much easier than my old system. Basically, plug and play. Blue tooth connectivity is great. No complaints so far, but it's only a week old.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The BEST Audio Experience with VIZIO V-Series 2.0 Sound Bar
reviews.reviewText: I recently added the VIZIO V-Series 2.0 Compact Home Theater Sound Bar (V20-J8) to my entertainment setup, and it has exceeded all expectations, delivering a stellar audio experience in a sleek and compact design.The DTS Virtual:X technology works wonders in creating a surround sound atmosphere without the need for additional speakers. Whether I'm watching movies, streaming shows, or playing games, the immersive audio quality adds a new dimension to my viewing experience. The sound is crisp, clear, and fills the room, making every moment more engaging.One of the standout features for me is the Bluetooth connectivity. Pairing the sound bar with my devices is a breeze, and the wireless streaming capability allows me to enjoy my favorite playlists with impressive sound quality. The Bluetooth feature also adds convenience for those who want to declutter their space without compromising on audio performance.The inclusion of voice assistant compatibility is a thoughtful touch. Being able to control the sound bar with my voice using a compatible assistant enhances the overall user experience. It's a testament to VIZIO's commitment to keeping up with modern technology trends.The compact design of the sound bar is another plus. It fits seamlessly into my entertainment setup without taking up much space. The minimalist aesthetic adds a touch of sophistication to my living room, and the included remote control ensures easy navigation and customization of settings.Setting up the VIZIO V-Series sound bar was a straightforward process, and the user-friendly interface makes it accessible for everyone. The remote control is intuitive, and the on-screen display provides clear feedback when adjusting settings.Considering the competitive price point, the VIZIO V-Series 2.0 Sound Bar is a fantastic value for the quality of audio it delivers. It has transformed my home entertainment system, making movie nights and gaming sessions more enjoyable than ever.In conclusion, if you're in the market for a compact yet powerful sound bar that won't break the bank, the VIZIO V-Series 2.0 is a top-tier choice. It's a reliable and feature-packed audio solution that elevates your home theater experience. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for an affordable upgrade in sound quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy set up and great sound but delayed volume control response
reviews.reviewText: Setup was as easy as plugging it into the TV and I was up and running. The sound is fantastic and fills up the whole room.The reason I gave it 4 stars and not 5 is because of the volume adjustment delay. When turning the volume up or down, there's easily a 3-5 second delay before the unit responds which usually results in overcompensating on the volume setting. Overall great for the cost.
Works great off bluetooth or optical cable. Decent subwoofer sound. Good remote.

received this in great timing. very easy to set up I have an older tv so connecting was a bit of time but once it saw it, I have flawless connections. Didn't go as loud as I thought it might but I'm not technical and specs are like dutch to me. lol Im happy it fits my needs.

Their are obviously better systems than this but you are getting a very good bang for your buck with this. Definitely loud enough and the sound quality is quite good. It should please all but the most critical of audiophiles out there (remember the price for what you get ratio). I definitely recommend it.

Honestamente no tenia una alta expectativa de este producto, ya que su precio es bastante bajo a comparación de otros productos en el mercado. Y puedo decir que estoy más que satisfecho con la compra. Cuenta con un sonido bastante bueno, no se distorsiona y los bajos se escuchan muy bien. Yo este producto lo compre pensando en usarlo para ver películas y series, y hasta el momento me hace sentir como si estuviera en un cine.El paquete incluye 1 barra de sonido, 1 subwoofer y 2 bocinas surround. Además, trae consigo un cable de sonido optico, un cable de HDMI/ARC, sus respectivos cables para conectar las bocinas surround al subwoofer, que dicho sea de paso cuentan con un gran largo en tamaño, trae un cable para conectar la barra de sonido a luz y uno para conectar el subwoofer a luz, además de un control y dos pilas AA.Uno de los puntos que me encantaron es que el subwoofer es inalámbrico, por lo que no tienes que preocuparte por tener demasiados cables recorriendo tu habitación. Además el control tiene una mini pantalla LCD para ver la acción que estas realizando.La barra de sonido cuenta con una entrada de sonido optico, una entrada HDMI/ARC, una entrada de cable Auxiliar, y otra de Auxiliar/VX, en la cual puedes conectar tu echo dot para utilizar con el teatro en casa, asi como una entrada de USB para poder reproducir música desde esta. Otro detalle importante es que cuenta con Bluetooth y para conectarlo es bastante sencillo. La barra cuenta también con una tira de leds las cuales te indican el sonido que la barra tiene al subir o bajar volumen, entre otros indicadores.La instalación es bastante sencilla y rápida.En conclusión, este sonido no le pide nada a productos de mayor precio o marcas reconocidas, por el precio puedes encontrar una gran calidad.ACTUALIZACIÓN: Después de un mes de uso sigo muy satisfecho con el producto, he probado las distintas configuraciones de sonido y todas son excelentes. El único detalle viene el el Subwoofer, ya que en ocasiones se puede escuchar un tipo de ruido en este, pero no es algo molesto.
